channel.title: Need help on making a server willing to pay
channel.description: i want to make my server and finish coding it and it would be a big help if you can help me make a webclient willing to pay or make co owner my skype is kooleojustin please help thanks

item.title: Need help on making a server willing to pay
item.dc:creator: @runewings317 runewings317
item.description:
@runewings317 wrote:

#1. If your going to pay someone, for Gods sake… Don’t post it on MoparScape in the help section…

#2. Although this is asking help of someone, this isn’t where you post it.

#3. If you want to post this, you should make a development team in the development team section of the forums. You will need
a) A 100x better version of this
b) Some pictures
c) A staff application for people to fill out

Follow these 3 simple steps and your on your way! Good luck!

Read full topic
item.source: Need help on making a server willing to pay
